channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-4221] Provide message localizations for 10.5
item.description: This JIRA collects localizations of messages created/changed by 10.5.1.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attaching changes.html, a web page listing the localization changes needed by 10.5.
Marking urgent for 10.5.2. I think it is worth holding up the release a few days for this if it is coming soon. Rick do you have an ETA ?

Hi Kathey,

From the email I've seen this week, it's clear to me that the localization team is working on our messages now. I pinged them this morning to ask for a status update. However, since it's nighttime where they live, I won't know anything more until tomorrow morning. I agree that it's worth holding up the release a couple days for this. I go on vacation Friday, but while I'm away I plan to checkin the localizations if they come back before you create the RC.

Thanks,
-Rick
Thanks Rick for the update and especially for compromising your vacation for this issue.

As with the 10.4 message localizations (see DERBY-3804), I would like to divide the 10.5 work into two phases:

1) The first phase sorts the existing messages files by SQLState, eliminating the comments. The comments add no value since the documentation in messages.xml is more extensive. Sorting the messages makes phase (2) easy.

2) The second phase is the actual work of merging in the localizations.

Attaching derby-4221-aa-01-stage1.diff. This accomplishes phase (1). For the engine localizations, there aren't many diffs and there are none for the DRDA localizations. That is because these files were sorted for 10.4. For the tools and sysinfo localizations, there are a lot of diffs because these files were not sorted for 10.4.

As a sanity check, I am running the regression tests now.

Touches the following files:

M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/toolsmessages_it.properties
M java/tools/org/apache/derby/loc/sysinfoMessages_ja_JP.properties

Tests passed cleanly for me. Committed derby-4221-aa-01-stage1.diff at subversion revision 792710.
Ported 792710 from trunk to the 10.5 branch at subversion revision 792716.

Attaching derby-4221-02-ab-stage2.diff. These are the 10.5 message localizations. As a sanity check, I will run the regression test suite. Touches the following files:

Changing this to Blocker for the 10.5.2 release. Since the translations are ready, we should wait until they are checked in.
Tests ran cleanly for me. Committed derby-4221-02-ab-stage2.diff to trunk at subversion revision 793870.
Ported revision 793870 from trunk to 10.5 branch at subversion revision 793874.
The localizations are checked into the 10.5 branch. I believe that this issue can be resolved.
Changing fix version so this shows up in release notes.
